meanings.definition: A period of time following a particular event or era.
meanings.sent1: Aftertime can be a time of reflection and growth.
meanings.sent2: We look forward to the aftertime after the storm has passed.
meanings.sent3: In the aftertime of the party, we found confetti everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The aftertime of winter brings the blossoming of spring.
meanings.sent5: The aftertime of the movie left us discussing its meaning for days.

meanings.sent1: Dreaming about the aftertime can be exciting.
meanings.sent2: We plan for the aftertime to ensure a successful outcome.
meanings.sent3: In the aftertime, we will have flying cars and robot helpers!
meanings.sent4: The aftertime holds the promise of new adventures and discoveries.
meanings.sent5: Imagining the aftertime can inspire us to work towards a better future.
